Bernie Sanders , a Vermont independent who's seeking re-election next year, distributed a fundraising appeal to constituents that detailed threats against Arizona Democratic lawmakers in addition to Gabrielle Giffords . It asked whether right-wing reactionaries, through threats and acts of violence, intimidated people with different points of view from expressing their political positions in the state. Nations community and are particularly thankful to Mr. Amir Dossal for accepting our invitation to serve as Special Envoy to the Summit,'' said Dan Doyle, the Founder and Executive Director of the World Youth Peace Summit. The World Youth Peace Summit brings scholar-athletes and scholar-artists from all over the world to Connecticut, so it truly is a natural partnership and we are thrilled to have the opportunity to incorporate the mission of the United Nations with the Summit's goals of promoting peace through athletics and the arts. Nobel Laureate and former United States Vice President Colin Powell and acclaimed author of Three Cups of Tea, Greg Mortenson , will speak at the World Youth Peace Summit, which comes to Connecticut in June and July,
